title: Save Saco Drive-In
description:
A movement has begun to save the Saco Drive-In... A project the Kirk Minihane Show is very interested in helping (00:10:10). Guy Geller is concerned his lunch with Harrison will start rumors around town (00:33:00). Chris is also concerned about Mike's jacket and raises the question of whether it's re-gifted (00:59:00). A comedian makes Joe Rogan quite uncomfortable when he calls him out during a routine for using racial slurs (01:07:00). Chris' game unveils an amazing upcoming show statistic (01:19:00) & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
